name: Save Christmas! (TheHibiscusPoet, MacksDev)
description:
NOTE: DO NOT ZOOM THE PAGE OR PLAY IN MAXIMISED VIEW AS THIS WILL MESS THE UI UP.

---------------------------------------------------------------

The evil spirits are on the rise again, stealing presents that doesn't belong to them! As a little tiny snowman, it's up to you to Save Christmas. Blast them with your Snow Launcher, and return presents to the Christmas Tree! But be careful, being out in the sun and not keeping warm with Santa Hats will cause you to melt away...

A jam game by Macks and TheHibiscusPoet.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left-click to fire.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Tips & Tricks:

  • Gold Presents are worth TWO presents but are rarer!
  • Follow the red particles, they will lead you to Santa's hat!
  • Spirits might drop presents when they enter the village, check all of the roads leading into the village frequently.
  • Spirits are likely to cross near the Great Christmas Tree Located at the centre of the map due to their curiosity, this makes for some good strategies!

---------------------------------------------------------------
